intro: Glowpop is a Precision Platformer starring a little alien explorer, The Yellow Punnu. Face danger and big bosses on alien worlds with your only help: A Glowing Heart.
description:
You are Yellow Punnu, a radiant explorer in search of the missing Green Punnu. Traverse four intriguing planets with five enigmatic maps each, facing haunting challenges armed only with a glowing heart.

Ready to really test your skills on a cute, but brutally challenging platformer game?

Fast-paced, challenging platformer adventure with beautiful environments, incredible soundtrack and mind-blowing storyline
Easy to learn and accessible mechanics, your bouncing and your light are all you need
Four planets, each with five different maps to explore, providing an increasing challenge for even the greatest adventurers
A brutal Terror Mode to test your skills, your nerves and your patience

Face peril and take your skills to the limit:
Bounce away from the many dangers of these alien planets. The Yellow Punnu might be small, but its flip jumps are epic!

Discover unique worlds and artstyle:
You can find some pretty locations to pop your round butt on a spike!

Enjoy the juicy Rainbow Glitter Splatter:
On a slight miscalculation of a jump, the cheerful little Punnu pops in all the colors of a rainbow. Like a balloon!

In a visually stunning universe, beware of dangers like spikes, acid, and more. Join Yellow Punnu and companions Blue and Red Punnu as they piece together the puzzle of Green's disappearance, revealing an epic danger threatening the entire universe.
